Back to Gabriel Fauré

Gabriel Fauré

Gavotte in C-sharp minor

1869 · N 14

Fauré later orchestrated the piece, which he included in his symphony in F major (op. 20; N 57), his incidental music to Masques et Bergamasques (op. 112; N 185a), and the four-movement suite (in versions for orchestra and for piano duet) taken from Masques et Bergamasques (op. 112; N 185b–c).

Recommended editions

  • Œuvres complètes (Bärenreiter) · VI/3 · BA 9471-01 · Œuvres pour piano á 2 mains III · ed. Jean-Pierre Bartoli

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 3
